gameTitle: A Simple Life with My Unobtrusive Girl
autoUpdate: Update available: Version ${} game data detected.
Would you like to download and update now?
SwitchLanguage: Restarting now to apply the new language settings!
ErrorReport: An error occurred. Please report the bug on the NLCH Discord server.
UpdateComplete1: The game will restart automatically after closing this window.
You can load the auto-save to resume progress!
UpdateComplete2: The game will restart shortly to apply the update!
RemindToUpdate: An error has occurred and the game is frozen.
Please use auto-update to fix the issue!
unimplementedDoor: This door won't push open from this side
zipUpdateComplete: Restarting the game to apply the update!
zipUpdateFail: Failed to extract and install the patch!
Please try the auto-update again or
manually extract the patch files to install!
installPatch: Patch requires extraction—installing now. This may cause the game to lag, please be patient!
totalFilesToUpdate: Detected ${} file(s) to update—starting download process!
silentUpdateSuccess: New patch content for ${} has been successfully installed and will take effect upon the next restart.
outdatedVersionWarning: Your current game version is outdated. The latest version is ${}.
Major version updates do not support automatic updates.
Please re-download the game from the official source.
nonHardwareAccelerated: The game is currently running on integrated graphics!
If your PC has a dedicated GPU, we recommend setting Game.exe
to use it in your graphics control panel for a smoother gaming experience.
isAmdCPU: Your CPU is detected as an AMD processor.
Some AMD chips may experience frame drops when playing VP9 (WebM) videos
in a Chromium environment. If you encounter this issue, try forcing the game to
use GPU rendering or update your drivers to help alleviate the problem.
failedToLoad: This kind of issue may be caused by:
① Game files corrupted or filenames garbled due to encoding issues during extraction/installation.
② The developer forgetting to include the file—please wait for a patch update to fix it.
lowResModeWarning: This feature is mainly for performance optimization on Android devices and may have little effect on the PC version.
When enabled, the game renders maps and images at a lower resolution and then scales them up,
reducing GPU load on mobile devices and lowering heat generation and power consumption.
Note: This is an experimental feature, and its effectiveness may vary depending on the device.
You can disable this feature at any time to immediately restore full image clarity.
cloudSaveServiceWarning: As the cloud save database is still under construction,
this feature will temporarily request access to your Google Drive
in order to store game save files in the NLCH/save folder.
Uploaded save files will only be used for future synchronization and
downloading back into the game, and will not be used for any other purposes.
Do you agree to grant the game permission to access your Google Drive?
uploadSaveFile: Downloading a save file from Google Drive will overwrite your current local save data!
steamWishlist: Our Steam store page is finally live!
Please add us to your wishlist and support us! (*´∀`)~♥
⬇Click below to open the Steam page.

firstTimeNotice: This is the legitimate player verification feature currently under testing.
You can log in with your Patreon account here to verify your identity!
Accounts with an active subscription will gain access to
features such as automatic major version updates.
Direct purchases of the game on Patreon are not
currently included in this verification scope.
We will later support verification for players
who purchased the game on other platforms,
and gradually roll out more services and feature support.
memberMenu.shortHint: Can now enable cloud saves & major updates
memberMenu.NotSubscribed: No active subscription detected. Some features are unavailable.
memberMenu.checkLatestVersion: Checking for the latest version, please wait...
memberMenu.isLatestVersion: You are already on the latest version!
majorUpdateFailed: Please try logging in for verification and start the update again,
or send this screenshot to our Discord server for assistance!
